title:
Bordered Floer homology, handlebody detection, and compressing
  diffeomorphisms
abstract:
We show that, up to connected sums with integer homology $L$-spaces, bordered
Floer homology detects handlebodies, as well as whether a mapping class extends
over a given handlebody or compression body. Using this, we combine ideas of
Casson-Long with the theory of train tracks to give an algorithm using bordered
Floer homology to detect whether a mapping class extends over any compression
body.
